data: {"generalSituation":"Winds will be weak over the coast of Guangdong tomorrow. It will be warm during the day with relatively low visibility in the morning. The easterly airstream is expected to persist over the coast of southern China early to midweek next week. It will be cloudier and humid with light rain over the region. Under the influence of a trough of low pressure, there will be a few showers over southern China in the latter part of next week.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20260222","week":"Sunday","forecastWind":"East to southeast force 3.","forecastWeather":"Sunny periods.
